alternatives.transcript: Researchers at the University of Tsukuba have created a mind blowing robotic floor that lets you walk freely inside virtual reality. It's called Circular Floor, and it uses real time motion tracking to predict your next step before you even take it. No matter which direction you walk, a new floor piece is always sliding into place under your feet.

It's called Circular Floor, and it uses real time motion tracking to predict your next step before you even take it.
No matter which direction you walk, a new floor piece is always sliding into place under your feet.
